text: we've been talking for a long time now
about how good exercise can be few
mental health what we really need to say
is that it's not just vigorous aerobic

health it's any kind of physical
activity at all that's really good news
if you're depressed and anxious there's
not too many depressed and anxious
people are able to motivate themselves
to exercise but many will be able to put
just a little more activity in their day
when you're thinking about increasing
your physical activity to improve your
psychological well-being there are some
important things to remember number one
is that you won't keep doing it or even
start doing it for that matter if you
don't enjoy it choose something you like
doing to ensure that you will be a
little more motivated to do it and to
continue to do it regularly secondly
don't start with a marathon start just
by being a little bit more active than
you are now with the future doing a
little bit more later on if you're doing
absolutely nothing try some stretches in
the morning or walking to the letterbox
to check the mail every little bit helps
just plan to do a little bit more than
you're doing now and do it regularly
thirdly be physically active with
someone else for company if that helps
you do it it often makes the activity so
much more enjoyable and you can hold
each other to task make sure you write
your plan down in detail including the

the way
don't forget to set a review date for
the plan when you'll consider whether
what you're doing is enough or you would
like to do some more
don't worry yes about whether it's
improving your mental health or not that
will sneak up on you over time just try
